original_text:
Celestial King
Celestial King è una slot machine prodotta dal provider Bally Technologies, a tema asiatico e ispirata alla leggenda di Sun Wukong, il Re delle scimmie protagonista di Journey to the West, un romanzo classico della letteratura cinese. Ci troviamo dunque nientemeno che in paradiso, tra nuvole cariche d’oro e al cospetto del Re Celeste.
Dal punto di vista del compartimento grafico, Celestial King offre ai giocatori un bel gioco con animazioni ed effetti speciali davvero ben fatti, grazie alla tecnologia 3D.
La schermata di gioco è immersa in un ipotetico paradiso su cui campeggiano nuvole dai toni del viola e dell’oro, oltre che misteriose pagode circondate da alberi.
Il Re Celeste, una simpatica scimmietta dagli occhi verdi, con tanto di copricapo rosso e scettro in mano, vi accompagnerà nel gioco a un lato della griglia dei rulli.
Una curiosità di questa slot machine è che è stata progettata dalla Bally, un colosso in ambito di giochi di slot sia online sia terrestre, per le sale gioco e dopo è stata proposta come slot online, senza perdere le sue caratteristiche principali, a partire dalla classica matrice di gioco a cinque rulli e tre righe.
Range di scommessa, RTP e Jackpot
Celestial King è strutturata con cinque rulli e 25 linee di pagamento, e offre un range di scommessa che va da un minimo di 0,50 € fino a 80 €, con la possibilità di puntare un massimo di 50 gettoni a ogni giro.
Il ritorno teorico al giocatore di questa bella slot machine è del 96% tondo, una percentuale non sorprendente ma in linea con la maggior parte dei giochi che potrete trovare nei casinò online.
Per quanto riguarda le vincite, avrete la possibilità di mettere le mani su uno dei tre jackpot, Mini, Minor e Major, quest’ultimo raggiungibile solo effettuando una scommessa minima di almeno 4 € e che ha un valore pari a ben 5.000 volte la puntata iniziale.
Simboli di Celestial King
Tra i simboli regolari di Celestial King troviamo innanzitutto le carte da gioco, riprodotte qui in stile asiatico, abbiamo poi i simboli tematici, rappresentati da dei fiori di loto, delle monete d’oro, una medaglia, un maialino sorridente e una sacerdotessa, che tra tutti i simboli regolari è quello che ha il valore maggiore, offrendo fino a 150 monete per linea in caso di allineamento vincente.
Il simbolo Wild non poteva non essere rappresentato dalla scimmietta, il Re Celeste in persona: ha funzione di jolly all’interno del gioco ma è anche un simbolo dal valore molto alto, pagando fino a 250 volte la puntata su una singola linea.
Lo Scatter infine è rappresentato da un Dragone, che permette non solo di accedere a un numero variabile di giri gratuiti, ma che se compare sui rulli 3, 4 o 5 volte offre un premio immediato pari a 250, 500 o 750 volte la scommessa.

raw_translation.response:
Celestial King is a slot game based on the Asian theme and inspired by the legend of Sun Wukong. This classic Chinese literature tells the story of the Monkey King on his journey to the West. The game is produced by Bally Technologies, and as an experienced gambler, you can appreciate the high-quality 3D animations and special effects. Imagine yourself in heaven surrounded by golden clouds and mysterious pagodas. The king of this paradise is a friendly green-eyed monkey with a red hat and scepter, standing by your side to help you win big as you spin the reels. 

One interesting fact about Celestial King is that it was originally designed for land-based casinos by Bally, a major player in the industry, before it became available online without losing its core features such as the classic 5-reel, 3-row layout. With a betting range from 0.50 € to 80 € and up to 50 coins per spin, you have a chance to win one of the three jackpots: Mini, Minor, and Major. The latter is worth an impressive 5,000 times your initial bet, but you need to place a minimum wager of at least 4 € to qualify.

The regular symbols in Celestial King include the usual playing cards styled in an Asian design, as well as thematic symbols such as lotus flowers, golden coins, a medal, a cute little pig, and a priestess. The highest paying symbol is the priestess, offering up to 150 coins per line when aligned correctly. The wild symbol, represented by the monkey king, can substitute for any other symbol except for the scatter and reward you with up to 250 times your bet on a single line. The scatter symbol is a dragon that not only gives you access to a variable number of free spins but also offers an immediate prize of up to 750 times your bet if it appears three or more times on the reels.

raw_translation.response:
Celestial King is a slot game produced by Bally Technologies with an Asian theme, inspired by the legend of Sun Wukong, the Monkey King from the classic Chinese literature, Journey to the West. The game takes place in heaven, amidst golden clouds and in the presence of the Celestial King.
The graphics are stunning, with 3D animations and special effects, making the game a joy to play.
The screen is set in an ethereal paradise with purple and golden clouds and mysterious pagodas surrounded by trees. The Celestial King, a friendly green-eyed monkey, with a red headdress and a scepter in his hand, accompanies you throughout the game on one side of the reel grid.
What makes Celestial King a unique slot game is that it was originally designed by Bally for land-based casinos and later adapted as an online slot game without losing its essential features, including the classic five reels, three rows, and 25 pay lines.
The game offers a betting range from a minimum of €0.50 to a maximum of €80, with the possibility of betting up to 50 coins per spin. The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this fantastic game is 96%, on par with other online casino games.
The game offers three jackpots, the Mini, Minor, and Major, with the latter being only achievable with a minimum bet of €4 and with a value of up to 5,000 times the initial bet.
The regular symbols of Celestial King feature Asian-style playing cards, lotus flowers, gold coins, a medal, a smiling pig, and a priestess. The latter has the highest value, offering up to 150 coins per pay line if properly aligned.
The Wild symbol is represented by none other than the Celestial King himself, the friendly green-eyed monkey. The Wild acts both as a jolly and a high-value symbol, offering up to 250 coins per pay line. The Scatter is represented by a Dragon, offering free spins and an immediate prize of up to 750 times the bet if appearing three, four, or five times on the reels.

The game offers three jackpots, the Mini, Minor, and Major, with the latter being only achievable with a minimum bet of €4 and with a value of up to 5,000 times the initial bet.
The regular symbols of Celestial King feature Asian-style playing cards, lotus flowers, gold coins, a medal, a smiling pig, and a priestess. The latter has the highest value, offering up to 150 coins per pay line if properly aligned.
The Wild symbol is represented by none other than the Celestial King himself, the friendly green-eyed monkey. The Wild acts both as a jolly and a high-value symbol, offering up to 250 coins per pay line. The Scatter is represented by a Dragon, offering free spins and an immediate prize of up to 750 times the bet if appearing three, four, or five times on the reels.

response.headline: Gameplay Mechanics and Features
response.content:
Looking for a slot game with a celestial twist? Look no further than Celestial King! This five-reel, three-row, and 25 pay line game is sure to bring you hours of fun and great wins.

With an Asian theme inspired by the legend of the Monkey King, this game offers more than just beautiful graphics and exciting sound effects. It also comes with three jackpots and a betting range from €0.50 to €80. With an RTP of 96%, you stand a great chance of scoring a big win.

But what sets this game apart from others out there? The answer lies in the Wild and Scatter symbols. The Celestial King himself represents the Wild symbol, and it can substitute any other symbol in the game except for the Scatter symbol, which is represented by a Dragon. If you land Scatters on reels one, three, and five, you activate the Free Spins Bonus round, and this is where the real fun begins! During the bonus round, the reels expand, and the number of pay lines doubles from 25 to 50. This means that you have even more chances to score a winning combination!

If you're feeling particularly lucky, why not take a shot at one of the three jackpots? These include the Mini, Minor, and Major Jackpots, and they're triggered at random. But don't worry, even if you don't hit the jackpot, you could still land a substantial win!

All in all, Celestial King is one of the most exciting and engaging slot games on the market today. So why not give it a try and see if the celestial creatures are smiling down on you?

response.headline: Symbols and Payouts
response.content:
Get ready for an encounter with the Celestial King, the Asian god of good fortune and prosperity. As you explore this celestial realm, you'll come across various symbols and payouts that will make your gaming experience highly rewarding.

The symbols in Celestial King are a blend of classic card symbols and unique icons inspired by Asian culture. You'll see gold coins, lotus flowers, a medal, a smiling pig, and a priestess. The highest-paying symbol in the game is the priestess, who will grant you up to 150 coins per pay line, if aligned correctly.

But wait, there's more! The game has two unique symbols that make everything about the game exciting - the Wild symbol and the Scatter symbol. The Celestial King himself represents the Wild symbol, and as you can imagine, he's the jolliest symbol of all. Not only can he substitute for any other symbol in the game, but he also offers up to 250 coins per pay line. Yay!

The Scatter symbol, on the other hand, is represented by a Dragon. This mighty creature not only triggers free spins, but it also comes with an immediate prize of up to 750 times the bet. Yes, you read that right - 750 times the bet!. To trigger these features, you need to land three, four, or five Scatters on the reels. The more Scatters you get, the higher the rewards.

In summary, Celestial King is more than just a slot game; it's a celestial journey filled with rewards and prosperity. With incredible payouts and exciting symbols like the Wild and Scatter, there's never been a better time to give Celestial King a spin!

faq.answer: Celestial King offers three jackpots, the Mini, Minor, and Major, with the latter being only achievable with a minimum bet of €4 and with a value of up to 5,000 times the initial bet.

faq.question: What are the regular symbols in Celestial King?
faq.answer: The regular symbols of Celestial King feature Asian-style playing cards, lotus flowers, gold coins, a medal, a smiling pig, and a priestess. The latter has the highest value, offering up to 150 coins per pay line if properly aligned.

faq.question: What is the Wild symbol in Celestial King?
faq.answer: The Wild symbol in Celestial King is represented by the Celestial King himself, the friendly green-eyed monkey. The Wild acts both as a jolly and a high-value symbol, offering up to 250 coins per pay line.

faq.answer: The Scatter symbol in Celestial King is represented by a Dragon offering free spins and an immediate prize of up to 750 times the bet if appearing three, four, or five times on the reels.

faq.question: What is unique about Celestial King?
faq.answer: What makes Celestial King a unique slot game is that it was originally designed by Bally for land-based casinos and later adapted as an online slot game without losing its essential features.

Review: Celestial King is a slot game produced by Bally Technologies with an Asian theme, inspired by the legend of Sun Wukong, the Monkey King from the classic Chinese literature, Journey to the West. The game takes place in heaven, amidst golden clouds and in the presence of the Celestial King.
The graphics are stunning, with 3D animations and special effects, making the game a joy to play.
The screen is set in an ethereal paradise with purple and golden clouds and mysterious pagodas surrounded by trees. The Celestial King, a friendly green-eyed monkey, with a red headdress and a scepter in his hand, accompanies you throughout the game on one side of the reel grid.
What makes Celestial King a unique slot game is that it was originally designed by Bally for land-based casinos and later adapted as an online slot game without losing its essential features, including the classic five reels, three rows, and 25 pay lines.
The game offers a betting range from a minimum of €0.50 to a maximum of €80, with the possibility of betting up to 50 coins per spin. The theoretical return to player (RTP) of this fantastic game is 96%, on par with other online casino games.
The game offers three jackpots, the Mini, Minor, and Major, with the latter being only achievable with a minimum bet of €4 and with a value of up to 5,000 times the initial bet.
The regular symbols of Celestial King feature Asian-style playing cards, lotus flowers, gold coins, a medal, a smiling pig, and a priestess. The latter has the highest value, offering up to 150 coins per pay line if properly aligned.
The Wild symbol is represented by none other than the Celestial King himself, the friendly green-eyed monkey. The Wild acts both as a jolly and a high-value symbol, offering up to 250 coins per pay line. The Scatter is represented by a Dragon, offering free spins and an immediate prize of up to 750 times the bet if appearing three, four, or five times on the reels.
